page.title: SaaS & Tech Google Ads Report Template 2026
page.metaDescription: Track CAC, LTV, and Trial Conversions. Advanced reporting for SaaS companies and Tech startups.
page.h1:
Scale Your SaaS with
Better Data.
page.subtitle: Stop optimizing for clicks. Start optimizing for MRR. The only template built for subscription business models.

executive.title: Board Deck View
executive.description: High-level metrics for investors. Burn rate efficiency, blended CAC, and MoM growth.

ecommerce.title: PLG Product Motion
ecommerce.description: Track signups to activation. Connect ad spend to user behavior inside your app.

agency.title: B2B Enterprise
agency.description: For high-ticket sales. Track qualified leads (MQL/SQL) and pipeline value contribution.

step1.title: Connect Data Sources
step1.description: Google Ads for spend, GA4/Segment for backend events.

step2.title: Define Events
step2.description: Map your 'Signup', 'Trial Start', and 'Purchase' conversion actions.

step3.title: Calculate CAC
step3.description: We automatically divide spend by custom conversions to show real Customer Acquisition Cost.

step4.title: Share with Team
step4.description: Give access to Product, Sales, and Founder. Align everyone on growth goals.

automation.title: Full Funnel View
automation.description: Don't just see the click. See the signup, the activation, and the revenue.

realtime.title: Daily Pulse
realtime.description: Fast-moving startups need daily data. Check your pacing and CAC every morning.

design.title: Tech-Native Design
design.description: Designed for dark mode users. Fits right into your stack alongside Linear and Vercel.

whitelabel.title: Custom Domain
whitelabel.description: Host metrics on metrics.yourstartup.com. Transparency builds culture.

multidevice.title: Responsive
multidevice.description: Check growth stats from your phone during investor meetings.

support.title: Data Engineers
support.description: Our support team speaks SQL and API. We help you debug tracking.

tip1.title: Track Blended CAC
tip1.description: Ad spend is only part of the story. Add organic traffic context to see blended efficiency.

tip2.title: Cohort Analysis
tip2.description: Use date comparison to see how signups from last month are converting today.

tip3.title: Brand vs Non-Brand
tip3.description: Split your reporting. Don't let cheap Brand clicks hide expensive Non-Brand CAC.

tip4.title: Value Based Bidding
tip4.description: Report on ROAS based on LTV predictions, not just first purchase value.

tip5.title: Pipeline Velocity
tip5.description: For B2B, track time-to-close. Are ads bringing in faster deal cycles?

tip6.title: Micro-Conversions
tip6.description: If sales cycles are long, report on 'Key Page Views' or 'PDF Downloads' as leading indicators.

tip7.title: Experiment Log
tip7.description: Keep a changelog in the report. 'Changed pricing page' - see impact on conversions.

faq.a1: Yes, you can input a fixed LTV value or calculate it dynamically if you pass revenue data.
faq.a2: Yes, excellent for high-ticket B2B lead gen tracking.
faq.a3: SOC2 compliant standards. Your customer data is safe.
faq.a4: Native Hubspot integration coming soon. For now, we track via GAds conversion import.
faq.a5: Yes, we support Firebase conversion tracking for app installs.
faq.a6: Use Presentation Mode. It looks like a polished slide deck, but live.
faq.a7: Set alerts for when CPA spikes above your target threshold.
faq.a8: Comment on charts directly to discuss anomalies with your team.
